name: The Eunuchs Rebirth: A Journey Back to Manhood
author: LICO
content: [By Force &amp LICO studio that brought you &ltReturn of Mount Hua Sect&gt and &ltChronicles of the Demon Faction&gt, and many more!The eunuch Lee Cheolsu, a secret power figure who controls the affairs of the empire at will. He possesses absolute power, wealth, and even strong martial arts skills… but what does that mean? If he can’t “do that”!!Through a reincarnation technique, Cheolsu returns to the time before he became a eunuch. He has one goal in mind: to become an alpha male and enjoy lif
